channel.title: Items kept on death
channel.description: I just recently added some pvp items to my server and now when u die u keep them on death. I don't know why this is happening. No other items except donator and death cape and a few other items are kept on death. This items are not in the list to be kept on death. But they are kept on death. Also if u drop them the "take" option is 2nd under an option that is just "..." if this has anything to do with it please tell me. Also i would love to know how to fix this.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2009, 01:29:58 pm[/size][hr]Someone please help

item.title: Items kept on death
item.dc:creator: @Ztink Ztink
item.description:
@Ztink wrote:

I just recently added some pvp items to my server and now when u die u keep them on death. I don’t know why this is happening. No other items except donator and death cape and a few other items are kept on death. This items are not in the list to be kept on death. But they are kept on death. Also if u drop them the “take” option is 2nd under an option that is just “…” if this has anything to do with it please tell me. Also i would love to know how to fix this.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2009, 01:29:58 pm[/size][hr]Someone please help
